alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:42PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mobile, George, Perry, southern Greene and northeastern Stone Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Chunchula to 7 miles south of Leakesville to 5 miles northeast of McLain to Richton. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Lucedale, Chunchula, Beaumont, New Augusta, McLain, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
